E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1983
Subject: Successful Promotion Day
Hello,
That was quite a nice game, the fans loved it!
It seems that the promotion was a success, our
fan interest increased!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Wednesday, 4/16/1983
Subject: Erasmo Perez healing process
Erasmo Perez is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1983
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Walter Gonzalas



Date: Monday, 5/12/1983
Subject: Dwight Mahurin healing process
Dwight Mahurin is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 6/2/1983
Subject: Progress of Steven Putz
Dear Sir,
Steven Putz has an ERA of 0.86 at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 6/2/1983
Subject: Progress of John Nazario
Dear Sir,
John Nazario has nothing more to prove at A Ft. Myers Miracle!
He has an AVG of .307 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1983
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Pedro Segarra
